trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que pode percorrer um conjunto de estados e manter um estado após sua definição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] armazenados em cache para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está armazenada no cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores da propriedade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] atual deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> referência para obter os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que tenha sido especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" /> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o padrão de controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> para recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse especificado <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> padrão de controle é obtido de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Percorre os estados de alternância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A control will cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle para percorrer seu <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> nesta ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> e, se suportado, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to toggle the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> padrão de controle é obtido de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> e subsequentemente é usada para alternar o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> deve percorrer seu <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> nesta ordem: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> e, se suportado, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, um elemento raiz é passado para uma função que retorna uma coleção de elementos de automação que são descendentes da raiz e atender a um conjunto de condições de propriedade.
